document.heading: Historic Preservation Tax Credit Partnership and Limited Liability Company Clarification Amendment Act of 2007

history.narrative: Law 17-40, the “Historic Preservation Tax Credit Partnership and Limited Liability Company Clarification Amendment Act of 2007”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-182 which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 21, 2007, and July 10, 2007, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 27, 2007, it was assigned Act No. 17-102 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-40 became effective on October 18, 2007.
